law.text:
On or before June 30 of the year before the evaluation date of a tax credit, each evaluation committee for that tax credit shall:
consult with:
the Department of Budget and Management;
the Department of Legislative Services;
the Comptroller; and
the Secretary, or the Secretary's designee, of the department that administers the tax credit under evaluation; and
prepare a plan for the evaluation.
